extendedInfo.description: Quit smoking with Smoking Log by gradually reducing the number of cigarettes you smoke daily. Set goals and track your smoking habits easily. View history to track your smoking habits and progress over time.** NOTE: This is a license only. You will still need to download "Quit Smoking Log", https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ccswe.SmokingLog to use the application **** Features **Summary View:* Displays a list of all recorded cigarettes* Warns you if you try to smoke before you have met your goal* Provides a summary for the day that tracks the number of cigarettes, time from last smoke, average time between cigarettesHistory View:* Allows easy comparisons of statistics between days* Provides an average of your smoking habits* Drill down into the summary view for previous daysChart View:* Visualize your progress across timeMiscellaneous:* [Plus] A widget to display today's summary* Easily configure/see your goals and how well you are meeting them* Insert cigarettes that you missed recording when you smoked them (ie: because you were driving)* Optional notification icon that displays last smoke status to quickly determine if you should wait to smoke or not* Frequent updates as needed*** We want to have the best application we can so please rate us. If you have any suggestions for improvements or encounter any issues send us feedback in the application or by emailing smokinglog@ccswe.com ***

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: Paid for this app but i cant access it. Not even able to get a refund
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pro strongly not recommended!
reviews.comment: I bought the pro licence to show support for the dev. The description says that if you buy the pro there won\'t be any ads. But I often see ads, and the app menu still shows purchase pro! So the licence is often not recognized by the app. I regret my over enthusiastic support to the devs. Strongly not recommended.  I still like the free app. You just don\'t get ANYTHING for this pro licence.
reviews.author: Debajyoti Nandi

reviews.title: Top app!
reviews.comment: A top app! Same great features as \'Quit Smoking Log\' - after all, this is just a license to unlock \'pro\' features of the app. 2nd day in & I\'ve already found I smoke less than I estimated I did, without even trying to cut down! Set your goal for time between smokes and when you smoke the notification bar indicator turns red, after a time goes to amber & eventually to green to show you\'re \'allowed\' to smoke. If you try to log a smoke before your target time\'s up, the app gently tries to dissuade you. 5*!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty Nice!
reviews.comment: Surprisingly, something as simple of tracking time between cigarettes is ACTUALLY working! I\'ve cut down to half in 2 days!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect for me, very helpful dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This thing works....
reviews.comment: It took me five days to cut down 15 cigarettes to 10. Four more days to totally kick the habit. Three months on, haven\'t relapsed yet. It is this app that made it possible. What it does is that it allows you to quit smoking in your own comfort, at your own speed. Who would have guessed keeping track of cigarettes smoked could actually help you ditch the damn habit??????
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I should have read the entire article.  Now that I have downloaded the app.  I\'m impressed with the lay out and look forward to getting started.\tIt says its installed.  But it,cannot be found,anywhere,on my HTC Thunderbolt.  Can\'t get refund either.
reviews.author: George Glenn
